title: [anvil] on avalanche `eth_sendTransaction` returns an error `max fee per gas less than block base fee` even after setting `_setNextBlockBaseFeePerGas` to zero
body:
### Component

Anvil

### Have you ensured that all of these are up to date?

- [X] Foundry
- [X] Foundryup

### What version of Foundry are you on?

forge 0.2.0 (ce52d85 2022-07-09T00:11:06.359354505Z)

### What command(s) is the bug in?

_No response_

### Operating System

Linux

### Describe the bug

getting the error in the title only on avalanche, mainnet works fine, the same works fine with hardhat on avalanche

reproduce
1. call `_setNextBlockBaseFeePerGas` with param 0x0
2. call `_impersonateAccount` 
3. call `eth_sendTransaction` with 0 for the gas price
